sentences.english: Xixia Tongguanshan India unearthed in 1983 for the objects.
sentences.chinese: 西夏銅官印1983年出土，爲一級文物。

sentences.english: He sported a pair of brass earrings.
sentences.chinese: 他的耳朵上戴着一副銅耳環。

sentences.english: Silver-plated copper center conductor for smooth, detailed sound production.
sentences.chinese: 鍍銀中心銅導體的順利，詳細的生產。

sentences.english: Copper methanesulfonate is synthesized and characterized by TGA and FTIR.
sentences.chinese: 合成了甲烷磺酸銅，用熱重和紅外對其進行表徵。

sentences.english: In this method the interference come from inorganic sulfide was removed by Copper acetate homogenous precipitation met…
sentences.chinese: 水中無機硫化物的干擾用乙酸銅均勻沉澱法去除。

sentences.english: Chlorophyllin has the anti-mutagenic activity and it has certain value of use.
sentences.chinese: 葉綠素銅鈉鹽有抗誘變作用，有一定的應用價值。

sentences.english: Trace copper in powdered drinks is determined by the EDTA titrimetry.
sentences.chinese: 採用EDTA減量滴定法測定固體飲料中的微量銅。

sentences.english: The strengthening mechanism of rare earth element in sintered copper molybdenum steel has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 探討了稀土在燒結銅鉬鋼中的作用機理。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a method for removing sulfur in a copper sulfide ore.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了一種銅硫礦脫硫的方法。

sentences.english: Some copper phthalocyanine derivatives were synthesized.
sentences.chinese: 本文合成了幾種銅酞菁的衍生物。

sentences.english: Structural features of the Yagra copper deposit in Deqen, Yunnan;
sentences.chinese: 滇西羊拉銅礦是近年來發現的大型銅礦牀。

sentences.english: Lead or annealed copper washers are most often used in fluorine and other reactive fluoride service.
sentences.chinese: 鉛或退火銅墊圈最經常用於氟和其它活潑氟化物設施。

sentences.english: The associated gold in Jiuhuashan copper deposit is significant for comprehensive utilization.
sentences.chinese: 九華山銅礦牀中伴生金已具綜合利用價值。

sentences.english: An example of calculation for copper-smelting process is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中給出了一個關於銅熔鍊過程的計算實例。

sentences.english: The copper producer will take delivery of half the ore, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他還表示，這家銅生產商將提取一半的銅礦石。

sentences.english: Leaching of copper from chalcocite with acidic acetonitrilecopper sulphate system was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用酸性乙腈硫酸銅體系從輝銅礦中提取銅。

definition: decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate
brass (alloy of copper 銅|铜[tong2] and zinc 鋅|锌[xin1])
hammer/to hammer into shape/weight (e.g. of a steelyard or balance)/to strike with a hammer
